titleStmt.title: John Boyle to R. C. Hewitt
CWG14228

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p:
504
January 29th 4
Dr R. C. Hewitt
Chrm Med Board
Louisville Ky
Dear Sir

Your Board will please examine Dr D W Suddarth, touching his qualifications for the place of Asst Surgeon, he having produced the necessary evidence of his loyalty and good moral character to the Governor.

Very truly Yours
John Boyle
Adj Genl Ky Vols.
